name: V-Fluid
description:
To provide Distance Learning in Physics Laboratory of Pakuan University V-Fluid provide theory and practical in the same time with 3D interactive simulation that works on Android Platform built with C# in Unity.

Content :

  • Massa jenis
  • Tekanan hidrostatik
  • Hukum Pascal
  • Gaya Archimedes
  • Viskositas
  • Azas Kontinuitas
  • Hukum Bernoulli
  • Post-Test

Feature :

  • Interactive 3D Simulation
  • Voice over Theory
  • Post-Test and Practice
